comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of February 22, 1914, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10D17FD355D13738... "RED BANK, N.J., Feb. 21. -- Thousands of people from all over this and New York State attended the annual ice carnival, held on the North Shrewsbury River here to-day." Of course, the photo could have been taken on a different day.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
